text.div:
This code system http://fhir.health.gov.lk/CodeSystem/allergy-intolerance-code-cs defines the following code:

CodeDisplayDefinition
Sub-1 Example substanceLevel 1 is the bottom level, below the lower edge of the pectoralis minor muscle.

name: LKCoreAllergyIntoleranceCodeCS
title: LK Core Allergy Intolerance Code System
description: Substances, medciations and other allergens for Sri Lanka

concept.definition: Level 1 is the bottom level, below the lower edge of the pectoralis minor muscle.
